item.title: WANs That Act Like LANs
item.description:
Local Area Networks (LANs) are so commonplace in businesses that they often go unnoticed, much like the electrical outlets we use daily. They provide a standardized way to connect devices, making them function seamlessly without users needing to consider technical details. Networks vs Utilities LANs can be compared to electricity: reliable and readily available. Just as we don’t think about voltage variations, we expect LANs to work without needing to understand the intricacies of Ethernet standards...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/wans-that-act-like-lans/
